Liza was a bit annoyed. Once again, an attempt to start a fashion trend (this time shirts with only one sleeve) had failed to catch on. This was the fifth time in the past year that she had tried and failed to start a trend.

What was she doing wrong? It wasn’t like she was unpopular, or unattractive (at least in her opinion). It didn’t make sense! People were just ignoring whatever little fashions she chose to debut.

Wait... “little” fashions. Maybe that was the key word here. Maybe the problem was that her fashion changes had been so subtle as to fly below notice...

Yes! That had to be it! If Liza wanted to start a trend, it had to be something drastic, something that couldn’t be ignored!

But what? Anything that involved wearing more clothes was probably a bad idea. It was the middle of May and temperatures were currently in the high 90s. Which left her with less clothes.

There were, of course, multiple ways to try and cut back on her attire, but few of them were good enough. Her new style had to pop, it had to stand out, it had to... shock!

That’s when Liza got the idea. What stood out more than baring what everyone else was covering? If she simply forewent clothing on her lower half...

That was it! It was original, it was noticeable, it was shocking! Besides, she’d still be wearing a top, so she wouldn’t be naked or anything. It was perfect!

So off to school she went, bottomless and proud, confident that her peers would be following her lead in no time at all.
